desc: Car Seat Bib combines ultra absorbent fabric and waterproof backing to protect babies, toddlers, kids from motion sickness and spills in the car, stroller, and meals. Oversized at 24" long x 19" wide, Car Seat Bib is soft, lightweight, breathable, washable, kid-safe, toxin-free, eco-friendly, and made in the USA.

layout.text: Meet the first ever Car Seat Bib.
